item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (173 points | 47 comments)
2. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (222 points | 150 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (174 points | 59 comments)
4. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (187 points | 166 comments)
5. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (189 points | 27 comments)
6. Supreme Court allows multibillion-dollar class action to proceed against Meta (58 points | 24 comments)
7. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (419 points | 114 comments)
8. Rust's Two Kinds of 'Assert' Make for Better Code (24 points | 22 comments)
9. 32k context length text embedding models (40 points | 14 comments)
10. Foursquare's 104M Points of Interest (22 points | 4 comments)
11. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (53 points | discuss)
12. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (50 points | 18 comments)
13. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (11 points | discuss)
14. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (31 points | 10 comments)
15. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (8 points | discuss)
16. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (96 points | 40 comments)

18. Developing nations blast $300B COP29 climate deal as insufficient (23 points | 18 comments)
19. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (79 points | 27 comments)
20. C++ Standards Contributor Expelled for 'The Undefined Behavior Question' (15 points | 6 comments)
21. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (41 points | 3 comments)
22. Hundreds More Nazca Lines Emerge in Peru's Desert (16 points | 11 comments)
23. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (161 points | 23 comments)
24. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (31 points | 2 comments)
25. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (57 points | 14 comments)
26. 2007 Boston Mooninite Panic (46 points | 26 comments)
27. Denmark will plant 1B trees and convert 10% of farmland into forest (65 points | 53 comments)
28. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (50 points | 9 comments)
29. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (287 points | 65 comments)
30. Music as Language (2019) [pdf] (47 points | 6 comments)
